body.description: Hydrates all day while mattifying & controlling surface oil. Formulated with electrolyte rich TruClean cactus water to instantly lock in hydration. This lightweight, fast-absorbing formula leaves a soft matte finish without the shine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UP TO 24HR HYDRATION This lightweight, fast-absorbing formula leaves a soft matte finish with up to 24HR hydration. FOR NORMAL TO OILY SKIN Hydrates all day while mattifying & controlling shine, visibly improving skin's texture and tone over time. Can be used morning or night. 100% VEGAN FORMULA Super-charged formula with naturally derived ingredients to lock in deep hydration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So... My face has always been really really oily, and bc of my oily skin and me not finding a cream or lotion that won't add more oil to my skin or that wouldn't break me out I gave up aling time ago. I randomly saw this on Amazon and decided, since it's Cyber Monday, I'll try it out! I came in the mail today and I washed my face and put it on afterwards, and I am very pleased & happy I purchased it! It's been on for 3 hours now, no oil and no breakouts!!! My face feels amazing, super clean and fresh! Not to mention it smells wonderful! I definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great everyday moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: This Moisturizer is light and absorbs quickly. It does not irritate my skin at all. I have combination skin and this works great at keeping my skin moisturized and not oily/greasy. This is a great light Moisturizer for anyone. Very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I liked how it was a good light moisturizer. It was not too heavy on the skin and was in fact mattifying. It smelled like a faint grapefruit. And it was pretty affordable the only thing think is that it doesn’t have that much moisturizer in the container. I loved the packaging cause it was cute and pink. It was good quality and it seemed very moisturizing throughout the day. I have purchased this before and would repurchase and recommend it. The only thing is seems not the most hygienic since you have to redip to get the moisturizer.Full credit to cvs for the photo. I didn’t want to take a photo of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I think I love it
reviews.reviewText: I have very very dry skin but I do not like regular creams or lotions on my face that feel greasy. This is like a gel and is never ever greasy. Has little to no scent and keep my face hydrated. I do use it a few times a day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have very stubborn skin. It doesn't know if it is oily or dry. When I use certain products I either dry my skin out too much or make it too oily, which then causes breakouts.So far with this moisturizer I have not had any problems. My skin feels perfectly moisturized after I put it on and does not look Shiny all. I would definitely recommend using this if you have complicated skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’m a huge fan of water creams and water gel moisturizers. I’ve been looking for an alternative to Belif Aqua Bomb because it’s very pricey. This product is not it, though the price point is hard to beat for a water cream. This could be a good option for someone seeking a very very light moisturizer.The texure is grainy. It doesn’t feel exfoliating or anything on the skin, but it’s just not the smooth, refreshing application I’m looking for. It also leaves a tacky residue on my skin, which is a no-go for me. I’m looking for matte.The smell is neutral and fine, neither stinky nor heavily perfumed. Hasn’t irritated my skin at all. It doesn’t feel particularly moisturizing though. My skin is dry right now, so maybe it’d hold up better for someone who just needed a very light moisturizer, or lived in a humid area.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product & dupe for clinique
reviews.reviewText: i’ve used cream moisturizers for years and recently got a clinique moisturizer as a bday gift from ulta. it’s very expensive for a one oz however, this one is 2oz at $7 and feels exactly the same with similar ingredients. I love how cooling, refreshing, & light weight this moisturizer is! I will definitely continue using this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product! I have never bought a matte moisturizer before. This definitely does what it says. You can actually feel your skin being moisturized and it stays. Because it is matte though, you will get to a point where it is no longer smooth so beware if your looking for a lotion type feeling. I personally love this product and would buy it again. It works really well under makeup too!

reviews.reviewTitle: Thought I was ordering one for 14.99, I got 2! :)
reviews.reviewText: It came 2 per box (like the picture another customer posted)! It felt like a steal. :) I gave one to my mom, and kept the other.It has a whipped texture, light and fresh fragrance. Upon application it is a bit sticky, but it dries down within a couple of minutes. It makes my skin feel soft and slightly waxy (but not in a bad way, also I may have applied too much), but that could be the glycerin and dimethicone in it. It's not a bad feeling though. I feel as if the moisture is locked in, and I have a barrier against the Canadian winter weather.

reviews.reviewTitle: Light on the skin and effective as well
reviews.reviewText: Feels really light on the skin, and is not greasy at all. Scent is minimum.

reviews.reviewTitle: This product made my skin itchy and caused a reaction.
reviews.reviewText: texture is good, smell is nice but its probably the perfume in it that caused my face to feel itchy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Feels so nice and is perfect for makeup
reviews.reviewText: As someone with oily and textured skin from acne scars, I love how this mattifying moisturizer feels on my face. It sits very well under my makeup, and very little goes a long way.

I love how lightweight this stuff is and how amazing it smells. Some days I don't find it's moisturizing enough for my liking. I'm not saying this is a bad product at all! Just be aware it isn't like your other typical cream based moisturizer.
